categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Dantooine base was a base operated in the badlands of Dantooine by the Alliance to Restore the Republic prior to the Battle of Yavin. By the time of the destruction of Alderaan, the base had been abandoned.

The Dantooine base was the first rebel base established by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It was established in the badlands of Dantooine some time before the Battle of Yavin. The base contained a vast enclosure that could house dozens of small starfighters, dozens of droid-charging ports, advanced communications technology, and dozens of bunks for several hundred troops. At one point, the Alliance troops planned to expand the base, starting to dig underground extensively. However, they were forced to abandon their Dantooine headquarters for reasons unknown, and established their new base on the fourth moon of Yavin.

General Antoc Merrick was in overall command of the starfighter squadrons on Dantooine. Gold Squadron was based there before being transfered to the Massassi Temple on Yavin following the Declaration of the Rebel Alliance by Mon Mothma in 2 BBY.

Some time later, Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan was captured by Grand Moff Tarkin, who kept her prisoner on the Death Star. When Tarkin threatened the princess with destroying her homeworld if she did not give up the location of the Alliance's base, Organa attempted to fool the Grand Moff by naming Dantooine. Tarkin, however, ordered the destruction of Alderaan anyway.

An Imperial survey team consisting of several scout ships and led by Cassio Tagge was dispatched to Dantooine to investigate the princess' claim. Although the Imperials did find the remains of the Alliance base, they rightly estimated that it had been evacuated some time ago. Nonetheless, they started conducting an extensive search of the surrounding star systems.
